page.title: 12RECREATION IN FRILSHAM
page.content: On the north is the only{pub,}the Pot Kiln an old house where the locals gather as well as people from outside the area. They can buy meals and snacks. They play darts or chat over a drink with friends.{Gardening}is popular with most residents. There are allotments as well as gardens. Men play{cricket and football.}They{fish. Older people have a{Friendship Club}in the village hall. There is a playing field and football team. The Womens Institute and the Mothers Union have recently been suspended for lack of support. Those who can afford it ride or hunt. Horses are used for recreation not work. The{horse trials} held at New Barn are nationally famous and attract famous riders. A{riding {unit}for the disabled at Marlston has extended under royal patronage to include carriage driving for children.
